Name: Sweet Potato (PH)
SeedDescription: Plant these in the fall. Takes 6 days to mature and has a chance of yielding multiple tubers per harvest.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plant these in the fall. Takes 6 days to mature and has a chance of yielding multiple tubers per harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: Plant these in the fall. Takes 6 days to mature and has a chance of yielding multiple tubers per harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanze sie im Herbst. Wächst in 6 Tagen heran und bringt manchmal mehrere Süßkartoffeln pro Ernte ein.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: Plant these in the fall. Takes 6 days to mature and has a chance of yielding multiple tubers per harvest.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.ja: Plant these in the fall. Takes 6 days to mature and has a chance of yielding multiple tubers per harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plant these in the fall. Takes 6 days to mature and has a chance of yielding multiple tubers per harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ru: Сажайте осенью. Вырастает через 6 дней. Есть вероятность собрать несколько клубней.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 秋天种植。 需要6天成熟，有机会获得多个红薯。
